modShortDescription: Bigger Backpack xml only (works server side). Main one is 90 slots, which also includes extra crafting slot, larger output, and expanded vehicle storage.
modDescription:
Yet another larger [backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/) mod. Many of them are made to be compatible with specific mods. This one is simple and standaloneâ€¦ except the 90 slot is recommended to have some kind of HUD mod that lowers the toolbelt. More details below.

Bigger Backpack xml only (works server side). Main one is 90 slots, which also includes extra crafting slot, larger output, and expanded vehicle [storage](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-storage/). (Requires a HUD that lowers the toolbelt). Other option is 60 slot, which works just like vanilla but with extra slots (does not require HUD modification).

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZmbUIf_tOyRkYs4IOsXQdbgnycITrngv/view?usp=sharing)** 60 Slot Version _(Basically vanilla with a larger inventory.)_  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15Ss4odBYR64b0jrVi4WA-7Dm0NFYKWYp/view?usp=sharing)** 90 Slot Version _(With the 90 Slot option, it is recommended to use a modified HUD in which the toolbelt is lowered. One option is [Riles HUDPlus](https://7daystodiemods.com/riles-hudplus/).)_

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22293-yet-another-larger-backpack-mod/).

**Credits:** [Riles](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/riles/)

modDownloadURLs.Info: 60 Slot Version (Basically vanilla with a larger inventory.)
90 Slot Version (With the 90 Slot option, it is recommended to use a modified HUD in which the toolbelt is lowered. One option is Riles HUDPlus.)
